entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_GENERIC_COMMAND
entry.description: Immediatedly start a generic mission
entry.param: Null, Elevator %, Depth m, or Altitude m

Interpret bytes as 32-bit unsigned int Byte 0 - Lateral Enum: 0=null, 1=rudder, 2=heading Byte 1 - Vertical Enum: 0=null, 1=elevator, 2=depth, 3=altitude Byte 2 - Longitudinal Enum: 0=null, 1=thrust, 2=speed Byte 3 - Roll Enum: 0=null, 1=aileron, 2=roll

message.name: MAGOTHY_LOW_BANDWIDTH
message.description: The heartbeat message shows that a system or component is present and responding. The type and autopilot fields (along with the message component id), allow the receiving system to treat further messages from this system appropriately (e.g. by laying out the user interface based on the autopilot). This microservice is documented at https://mavlink.io/en/services/heartbeat.html
message.field: Vehicle or component type. For a flight controller component the vehicle type (quadrotor, helicopter, etc.). For other components the component type (e.g. camera, gimbal, etc.). This should be used in preference to component id for identifying the component type.
A bitfield for use for autopilot-specific flags
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors are present. Value of 0: not present. Value of 1: present.
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors are enabled: Value of 0: not enabled. Value of 1: enabled.
Bitmap showing which onboard controllers and sensors have an error (or are operational). Value of 0: error. Value of 1: healthy.
Battery voltage, UINT16_MAX: Voltage not sent by autopilot
Battery current, -1: Current not sent by autopilot
Battery energy remaining, -1: Battery remaining energy not sent by autopilot
Sequence number of the current active mission item. UINT16_MAX: not in mission
Latitude (WGS84, EGM96 ellipsoid)
Longitude (WGS84, EGM96 ellipsoid)
GPS ground speed. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
Course over ground in degrees * 100, 0.0..359.99 degrees. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
Number of satellites visible. If unknown, set to 255
Heading in degrees * 100, 0.0..359.99 degrees. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
1 if position measurement is independent (gps), else 0
Position estimate error. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
Desired ground speed. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
Desired course over ground in degrees * 100, 0.0..359.99 degrees. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX

message.name: MAGOTHY_LICENSE_INFO
message.description: Sent from Vehicle. Contains product licensing information such as product key and activation status.
message.field: 1 if license key is set, else 0
1 if license key is valid, else 0
license product_key - must be null terminated if length is less than 64
user provided description - must be null terminated if length is less than 64

message.name: MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER_INITIALIZE
message.description: Sent from Magothy Console to Vehicle, command to generate an license [de]activation file. Vehicle will respond with MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER_ACK
message.field: system id of target system
file type
license product_key - must be null terminated if length is less than 64
user provided description - must be null terminated if length is less than 64

message.name: MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER_REQUEST
message.description: Sent from Magothy Console to Vehicle, requests a partial license manager file. Vehicle will respond with MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER
message.field: system id of target system
file type
chunk index of license transfer

message.name: MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER
message.description: Sent to/from Magothy Console and Vehicle. Used to transfer a portion of a large payload. When the Vehicle receives this message, it will respond with MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER_ACK
message.field: system id of target system
file type
chunk index
total number of chunks
CRC-16/CCITT-FALSE of complete payload
length of this chunk payload
payload of this chunk

message.name: MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER_ACK
message.description: Send from Vehicle to Magothy Console. Sent as a response to MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER_INITIALIZE and MAGOTHY_LICENSE_TRANSFER messages
message.field: system id of target system
file type
chunk index
total number of chunks
CRC-16/CCITT-FALSE of complete payload
result of command
